    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_0f3e1ea76e82cc21afa0c8995690f1a790ad72a5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_0f3e1ea76e82cc21afa0c8995690f1a790ad72a5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earth's gravitational field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Gravitations Masse fängt auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le gisement de la gravité de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Campo gravitacional da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giacimento gravitazionale della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινο βαρύτητας πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Campo gravitacional de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the Earth's gravitational field can be represented by lines of forces acting toward the centre of the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lines of force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der Masse, die 
Gravitations ist, kann durch Zeilen der Kräfte dargestellt werden 
auffängt, die zur Mitte der Masse fungieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le gisement de la 
gravité de la terre peut être représenté par des lignes des forces
agissant vers le centre de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o campo 
gravitacional da terra pode ser representado por linhas das forças 
que agem para o centro da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il giacimento 
gravitazionale della terra può essere rappresentato dalle righe delle
forze che si comportano verso il centro della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το γήινο βαρύτητας 
πεδίο μπορεί να αντιπροσωπευθεί από τις γραμμές δυνάμεων 
ενεργώντας προς το κέντρο της γης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el campo 
gravitacional de la tierra se puede representar por las líneas de las
fuerzas que actúan hacia el centro de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitations fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeilen der Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone de la gravité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pesanteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lignes de la force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo gravitacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linhas da força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo gravitazionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">righe di forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητας πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμές δύναμης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo gravitacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">líneas de la fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
